AAF.caption: images are uploaded
AAF.doc: This occurs when the images are finished uploading to Bubble & the element's state is updated with the uploaded_files URL's
AAF.name: images_are_uploaded

AAK.caption: Max number of files
AAK.doc: Choose the max number of files you want a user to select. If you select 1, the user will only be able to choose 1 image.
AAK.name: max_number_of_files

AAS.caption: File type to choose
AAS.doc: This is the File Type you want the users device to open to. This DOES not limit them from selecting other files, it just allows the device to know what to look for.
AAS.name: file_type

AAa.caption: Too many files message
AAa.doc: This is the message that is displayed when user tries to select too many files.
AAa.name: too_many_files_message

AAE.caption: Uploaded FIles
AAE.doc: These are the files after they have been uploaded to Bubble Storage.
AAE.name: uploaded_files

AAJ.caption: All Files
AAJ.doc: This is the list of files that is rendered instantly, from the users files. You can display these in any Bubble Element you want.
AAJ.name: all_files

AAN.caption: Files are Uploading
AAN.doc: This state is "Yes" while the files are uploading.
AAN.name: files_are_uploading
